content: All previously added Users became Guests and now available in the {{sectionName}} list of the {{productName}} administrators only. Guests are no longer part of any groups. You can always change their type and add them to a group, if necessary.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a dialog tip that informs users about changes to their account type after releasing guests in the product. It explains that guests are now only accessible by administrators and can be converted back to other types if needed.

usage.context:
<StyledBody>
 <Text fontSize="12px" fontWeight={400} lineHeight="16px" noSelect>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 ns="Translations"
 i18nKey="GuestConversionNote"
 values={{
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 sectionName: t("Common:Contacts"),
 }}
 />
